sqlMap.select: SELECT type, code, name FROM public.ic_code ORDER BY type, code
SELECT sig_cd, sig_kor_nm FROM public.tl_scco_sig GROUP BY sig_cd, sig_kor_nm ORDER BY sig_cd

SELECT emd_cd, emd_kor_nm FROM public.tl_scco_emd
WHERE emd_cd LIKE '' || #sig# || '%' GROUP BY emd_cd, emd_kor_nm ORDER BY emd_cd

SELECT li_cd, li_kor_nm FROM public.tl_scco_li
WHERE li_cd LIKE '' || #emd# || '%' AND RIGHT(li_cd, 2) <> '00' GROUP BY li_cd, li_kor_nm ORDER BY li_cd
sqlMap.insert:
/* 일렬번호 생성 */ SELECT COALESCE(MAX(gid), 0) + 1 AS gid FROM factual_survey
INSERT INTO factual_survey ( lclas, mlsfc, sclas, ctp, sig, emd, mt, bon, bu, prprty_mg, jimok, n_jimok, qota, acqs, acqdt, use, area, jiga, prsmppc, prpos, lmtt, ubplfc, frm, gfe, ro_side, ctp_1, occp_lo_2, occp_lo_t_2, occp_cmp_2, occp_etc_2, own_nm_2, own_rgist_2, own_bild_2, own_area_2, own_totar_2, own_gr_2, own_ugr_2, own_use_2, own_rf_2, own_str_2, own_t_use_2, own_dsstr_2, loan_nm_3, occp_pr_3, occp_pr_t_3, occp_pd_3, occp_lo_3, occp_lo_t_3, occp_cmp_3, occp_etc_3, own_nm_3, own_rgist_3, own_bild_3, own_area_3, own_totar_3, own_gr_3, own_ugr_3, own_use_3, own_rf_3, own_str_3, own_t_use_3, own_dsstr_3, loan_nm_4, loan_cttpc_4, loan_area_4, loan_a_r_4, loan_pd_4, loanmn_4, loan_totar_4, loan_t_r_4, loan_use_4, loan_pr_4, loan_pr_t_4, loan_etc_4, occp_nm_4, occp_cttpc_4, pnu, gid )VALUES( #lclas#, #mlsfc#, #sclas#, LEFT(#sig#,2), #sig#, #emd#, #mt#, #bon#, #bu#, #prprty_mg#, #jimok#, #n_jimok#, #qota#, #acqs#, to_date(#acqdt#, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), #use#, (#area#)::double precision, (#jiga#)::double precision, (#prsmppc#)::double precision, #prpos#, #lmtt#, #ubplfc#, #frm#, #gfe#, #ro_side#, LEFT(#sig_1#,2), #sig_1#, #emd_1#, #mt_1#, #bon_1#, #bu_1#, #jimok_1#, (#area_1#)::double precision, #buld_yn_1#, LEFT(#sig_2#,2), #sig_2#, #emd_2#, #mt_2#, #bon_2#, #bu_2#, #jimok_2#, (#area_2#)::double precision, #buld_yn_2#, LEFT(#sig_3#,2), #sig_3#, #emd_3#, #mt_3#, #loan_pd#, (#loanmn#)::double precision, (#loan_totar#)::double precision, (#loan_t_r#)::integer, #loan_use#, #loan_pr#, #loan_pr_t#, #loan_etc#, #occp_nm#, #occp_cttpc#, (#occp_area#)::double (#own_gr_2#)::integer, (#own_ugr_2#)::integer, #own_use_2#, #own_rf_2#, #own_str_2#, #own_t_use_2#, #own_dsstr_2#, #loan_nm_3#, #loan_cttpc_3#, (#loan_area_3#)::double precision, #li_4#, #li_5#, (#ic_area#)::double precision, (#ic_prsmppc#)::double precision, (#ic_per#)::double precision, to_char(now(),'yyyy/mm/dd HH24:mi:ss'), #regest_id#, #use_at#, #pnu#, (#gid#)::integer )

/* 일렬번호 생성 */ SELECT COALESCE( MAX(gid),0 ) + 1 AS gid FROM in_file
INSERT INTO in_file ( table_type, row_gid, files_order, files_org_name, files_sav_name, files_size, files_path, files_type, files_down_co, gid ) VALUES ( #TABLE_TYPE#, #TABLE_ROW_GID#, (#order#)::integer, #originalFileName#, #uploadFileName#, (#fileSize#)::double precision, #filePath#, #fileExtension#, 0, (#gid#)::integer )
sqlMap.select: select count(*) as CNT from factual_survey WHERE use_at = 'Y' and sig = #sig# and emd = #emd# and li = #li#
SELECT * FROM in_file WHERE row_gid = #row_gid# order by files_order WHERE gid = (#gid#)::integer order by files_order
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE factual_survey SET lclas = #lclas#, mlsfc = #mlsfc#, sclas= #sclas#, ctp = LEFT(#sig#,2), sig = #sig#, emd = #emd#, mt = #mt#, bon = #bon#, bu = #bu#, prprty_mg = #prprty_mg#, jimok = #jimok#, n_jimok = #n_jimok#, qota = #qota#, acqs = #acqs#, acqdt = to_date(#acqdt#, 'YYYY/MM/DD'), acqdt = null, use = #use#, area = (#area#)::double precision, area = null, jiga = (#jiga#)::double precision, jiga = null, prsmppc = (#prsmppc#)::double precision, prsmppc = null, prpos = #prpos#, lmtt = #lmtt#, ubplfc = #ubplfc#, frm = #frm#, gfe = #gfe#, ro_side = #ro_side#, ctp_1 = LEFT(#sig_1#,2), sig_1 = #sig_1#, emd_1 = #emd_1#, mt_1 = #mt_1#, bon_1 = #bon_1#, bu_1 = #bu_1#, jimok_1 = #jimok_1#, area_1 = (#area_1#)::double precision, area_1 = null, buld_yn_1 = #buld_yn_1#, ctp_2 = LEFT(#sig_2#,2), sig_2 = #sig_2#, emd_2 = #emd_2#, mt_2 = #mt_2#, bon_2 = #bon_2#, bu_2 = #bu_2#, jimok_2 = #jimok_2#, area_2 = (#area_2#)::double precision, area_2 = null, buld_yn_2 = #buld_yn_2#, ctp_3 = LEFT(#sig_3#,2), sig_3 = #sig_3#, emd_3 = #emd_3#, mt_3 = #mt_3#, bon_3 = #bon_3#, bu_3 = #bu_3#, jimok_3 = #jimok_3#, area_3 = (#area_3#)::double precision, area_3 = null, buld_yn_3 = #buld_yn_3#, ctp_4 = LEFT(#sig_4#,2), sig_4 = #sig_4#, emd_4 = #emd_4#, mt_4 = #mt_4#, bon_4 = #bon_4#, bu_4 = #bu_4#, jimok_4 = #jimok_4#, area_4 = (#area_4#)::double precision, area_4 = null, buld_yn_4 = #buld_yn_4#, ctp_5 = LEFT(#sig_5#,2), sig_5 = #sig_5#, emd_5 = #emd_5#, mt_5 = #mt_5#, bon_5 = #bon_5#, bu_5 = #bu_5#, jimok_5 = #jimok_5#, area_5 = (#area_5#)::double precision, area_5 = null, buld_yn_5 = #buld_yn_5#, loan_nm = #loan_nm#, loan_cttpc = #loan_cttpc#, loan_area = (#loan_area#)::double precision, loan_area = null, loan_a_r = (#loan_a_r#)::integer, loan_a_r = null,
